title: Gay Cyclops GangBang
description: Ampelios has been trapped in the Cyclops cave for three days now, planning a way to escape. He has nearly made it out of the cave and can see the shore below, but is captured again by one of the three Cyclops who have taken him. They all want to teach him a lesson for trying to escape... This is a 3,500 word hardcore cyclops sex story, featuring anal, double anal, dub con and cream pies. Do not read unless over 18!
author: Hunter Fox
